plot: A bookie decrees his muscle to collect a gambling debt and bribe a United States Senator to lobby for the legalization of in-house and online gambling.
title: Illegal and Thriving
plot_es: A bookie decrees his muscle to collect a gambling debt and bribe a United States Senator to lobby for the legalization of in-house and online gambling.
plot_en: A bookie decrees his muscle to collect a gambling debt and bribe a United States Senator to lobby for the legalization of in-house and online gambling.
